title: Unable to connect to the authentication Service
body: Okay so this started on Friday October 20th 2017 around me 10 p.m. eastern time I've been having this issue and I've tried every connection guide and I've tried the hextech tool repair and it hasn't worked, I even moved to a different location to see if there was my net and it turns out I couldn't get on league in other  location as well and I've still had no luck. I've tried are logging on to leagues website and I can also I can't log on there as well so I'm talking on my mobile device which is the only way I can possibly talk on on the boards, can I please get some help on how to resolve this issue I've never had this issue before.

replies.body:
If you still haven't been able to get logged in, I wonder if your connection is being routed to our servers in a really awkward way. Let's adjust a couple network settings really quickly and let me know if this gets you in or not.

Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings. Update those really quickly and let me know if that still doesn't help.
also am having this issue and nothing on the support page has worked. and im about to be punished for something i cant control

But Wishingwellz is having problems logging into the game. How are you about to be punished if you aren't even logged in o_O?

Let me know what's actually happening and I can help you through a couple troubleshooting steps.

Okay I've tried port forwarding and the DNS guide again and it still did not work I still cannot log into League of Legends website or the game but I'm able to use my mobile device to login in discuss my issue on the boards.
https://gyazo.com/571f37b5164a1fd0fc4e0b677ff0b381

https://gyazo.com/199777e9722a1b8f7f44068fec56ad03

I know my reply here took a little bit, but are you still having problems getting signed in? Since it wasn't an issue with your ISP I was wondering if that IP refresh was able to help or not. 

If you still can't get signed in, I'd hate to go back and forth with hours between our responses. Go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look over some of your network logs. There might be a firewall or something blocking your access, but they'll be able to tell what's up with those logs.
Yeah it didn't work thanks for helping I'll just I'll just talk to tech support
I have the same problem, the launcher won't start the game but instead saying "Unable to connect to the authentication service." I've tried everything on the other forums and nothing works

Oh i did not see that his issue was with log in. see im having the same issue but once i go to load into a game i get a black screen saying something about a connection error saying to check my video drivers to make sure they are up to date. which they are
the error says "An unknown directX error has occurred and league of legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer"
I'm having the same problem right. Anyone else? :(
same, just keep trying it finally logged in for me after trying maybe 67 times
Same.... worked yesterday just fine for me :/
